name: Ursus Shock
types: The Seven Warlords of the Sea/Revolutionary Army

trigger.text: Draw 1 card. Then, trash the top card of your deck.

text: Main K.O. up to 1 of your opponent's Characters with a cost of 4 or less. If you have a Character with a cost of 8 or more, you may instead K.O. up to 1 of your opponent's Characters with a cost of 6 or lower.

effect.text: K.O. up to 1 of your opponent's Characters with a cost of 4 or less. If you have a Character with a cost of 8 or more, you may instead K.O. up to 1 of your opponent's Characters with a cost of 6 or lower.
Draw 1 card. Then, trash the top card of your deck.
